response: Welcome to our module on the ease of scooter ownership. We offer features for your convenience, like home service and seamless charging with a portable charger that plugs into a regular socket. Our expanding network of hyperchargers provides fast, free charging on the go. Service is simple with app booking, at-home service, predictive AI maintenance, and 24/7 roadside assistance. Plus, enjoy lower running costs with up to 1 kilometer for just 17 paise on Ola S1, saving you ₹77,316 in one year. These features make owning and maintaining your scooter easier than ever. Thank you.
title: L1.1.4 Ownership made easy.mp4
